data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Feng, Jiyuan, Shi, Fuming, Mao, Shaoli (2017): Review of the subgenus Xizicus (Xizicus) Gorochov, 1993 (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae) from China. Zootaxa 4247 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4247.1.9|1 occurrence
